Exercise Settings How physically active are you during your work/day time? (even work at home, sick leave or studying for instance at University) a. mostly sitting b. seated work but some requirement to move around (e.g. office work with light activities) c. standing/walking most of the time (e.g. shop assistant, delivering mail, cleaning work) d. heavy work (e.g. manual work like construction or farming) Describe your physical activity in your leisure time. a. Very light (e.g. mostly sitting) b. Light (e.g. light walking for 30 minutes or less most days) c. Moderate (e.g. regular activities most days such as vigorous walking, cycling or sport for 30 minutes or longer) d. Very active (e.g. more than an hour of daily strenuous activities such as sport or cycling)
